issue.title: [CI] Remove Boost download step in Github Actions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8195](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8195). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
According to https://github.com/actions/virtual-environments/issues/370, the full version of Boost should now be properly installed on the GHA Windows 2019 image. We should try to remove the Boost download step, which is quite slow (it installs 2GB worth of files).
